title: RHOP Monique Under Fire + Sex and the City BONUS Recap

description:
Danny recaps this week's Real Housewives of Potomac, which features the women chatting with Monique about the fallout with Candiace, plus some thoughts on the new Emily in Paris on Netflix. Then Danny offers a sneak peak of the first episode of the Sex and the City series recap, which he is doing for Patreon. If you like it, you can subscribe to the Everything Iconic Patreon at Patreon.com/EverythingIconic. If you donate $4 or more, you get access to the bonus episodes like this, plus you help support this pod! <3


Sex and the City Recap: 23:50ish


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
